title: How to become a famous kid singer - Quora

response.answer_text: You must know hot so singYou must be unique in some wayYou must be charismaticYou must have composing and writing abilities or have someone who will write songs for youRecord yourself sing on video and post it to youtubeGo to every singing contests you can (the voice,etc…)Start performing for free in school parties, bar mitsvah parties, birthdays ,etc..Eventually someone will see your tallent. Justin Bieber started on youtube. Good luck. P.S. if you have audio\video of you, please share it in the comments.

Becoming a famous kid singer will take a lot of planning, practice, and networking. Plan where you want to be in the next few years with small realistic goals that will help you reach that spot. Plan time each day to work on your music. Plan your extra time for managing your social media for everyone to see your talent. Get in touch with local musicians and build relationships with them. If there are some TV shows that will pass by your area, audition when you’re ready. Jamout - making musicians' lives easier P.S. Get your free account at Jamout
